name: A Janitor's Nightmare
description:
Bevy Jam #1 Submission [SOURCE]

After trying the online mode of the game, we would love to collect some information about your connection experience! [FORM]

Rowdy school kids have built a cardboard fortress equipped with a cake catapult! There is nothing the old janitor can do but clean up the mess.

The game is played over two rounds. The janitor who left the smallest mess at round end wins!

Controls: WASD + SPACE, in local mode p2 ARROWS + RSHIFT

KNOWN ISSUES:

- game crashes after a game is over. please reload the page for now.
